item.title: [317] how can i change my coin amount so i can have 999b instead of 2b
item.dc:creator: @bifocaler_2 bifocaler 2
item.description:
@bifocaler_2 wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:2, topic:347803”][quote author=bifocaler 2 link=topic=444184.msg3261374#msg3261374 date=1278528040]
how can i change my coin amount so i can have 999b in coins instead of 2b
[/quote]

I don’t know how, But I do know that the reason you can have 2.14b Is because thats the highest number that Ints go to.[/quote]dam i dont think there is a way then to get 999b coins then
